description: User and developer documentation, monitoring setup, and production deployment

issues.title: Update authentication documentation
issues.description: Update help documentation for new authentication options, create troubleshooting guide for common issues and solutions, and document account linking benefits for users. Ensure clear guidance for all user types.

issues.title: Update developer documentation
issues.description: Update component documentation for all new components, document any API changes and enhanced functionality, create deployment guide covering Firebase setup and environment variables, and update README with new authentication features.

issues.title: Set up authentication monitoring
issues.description: Deploy to staging environment for full testing, set up monitoring for authentication success rates and error tracking, configure analytics to track authentication method usage patterns, and prepare production deployment with gradual rollout.
